question: A friend you made while you were studying abroad has written to ask you for help in finding a job in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company that might be suitable for him/her.Write a letter to this friend. In your letter•  tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involves•  say why you think the job would be suitable for him/her•  explain how to apply for the job
text: I  am glad to hear from you again!

The job you asked me about in my country is ready now. And I am finding an international company named Guanxun Tec Co., in Shanghai City is recruiting some new workers. As you know the corporation is a high-tech company, and they design new internet hardware for laptop manufacturers.

The Guanxun group focus on effective and convenient chips for users. So, what the new occupation skills need is required to write codes, edit them, and program chips, which you do well on them as I know. All in all, the new applicant needs English skills, IT technical and Mathematical thinking, which you all grand.  That is to say, you are ready for the job.

It is easy to apply for the job online. You can prepare a nice VC including your professional skills and social photos or videos, and then email it to the group HR email address which is attached to this email.
Don't hesitate to tell me what else I can help you
